summary: REQ-1 (remove the Caffeine footer branding line on the Landing Page) cannot be conclusively verified from the provided truncated LandingPage.tsx excerpt because the footer section containing the targeted second paragraph (p[2]) is not shown. The diff also includes changes to project tracking metadata and repository summary text that are not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Project tracking/metadata updates adding new_feature_requests entries (AR-1/AR-2) unrelated to implementing the footer paragraph removal itself.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to remove a specific footer branding line on the Landing Page and explicitly constrains changes to the selected element; updating project_state.json is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Repository-wide narrative summaries describing numerous unrelated frontend features/styling changes (dashboards, hooks, Tailwind/CSS, README, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to deleting a single footer paragraph element; adding/updating broad feature summaries is not requested.
